title: Wonderful location for commuters! We're near public transit
posting_body: ['IMT Hyland Hills', 'Located at: 4901 W 93rd Ave Westminster, CO 80031', 'Featured unit: 1 bed | 1 bath | 795 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $2030/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', '**Walk-ins welcome & choose from 3 tour options.', '**', 'IMT Hyland Hills Apartments is a beautiful community, tucked away along with the quiet serenity of Hyland Hills golf course.', 'Conveniently located 15 minutes from downtown Denver or Boulder with easy access to highway 36.', 'IMT Hyland Hills is walking distance to shopping and fine dining or a short drive to the Flatirons Crossing mall, Interlocken, Westminster Promenade or Front Range Community College.', 'Choose from a sophisticated collection of one and two-bedroom luxury apartments homes, enjoy spectacular mountain and golf course views and relax with all the amenities that an active lifestyle demands right here at IMT Hyland Hills.', 'Take a Virtual Tour of Our Property Today!', '<URL>', 'Wonderful Amenities!', '● Cabana Pool', '● Clubhouse Pool & Spa', '● IMT Active', '● IMT CoWork', '● IMT Pets Park', '● Outdoor Pavilion', '● Recycling', '● 15 Minutes from Denver & Boulder', '● 24/7 Emergency Maintenance Service', '● 24-Hour Package Lockers', '● Attached & Detached Garages Available', '● Barbecue & Fire Pit Area', '● Minutes from Interlocken & FlatIron Crossing', '● My IMT Resident Portal with Online & On-Site Kiosk Access: Utilities Connection, Rent Payment, Service Requests, Account Information & Community Postings', 'Apartment Features!', '● Cable Ready', '● Central Air Conditioning', '● Gas Fireplaces In Select Units', '● In-Home Washer/ Dryer', '● Mountain, Pool or Golf Course Views In Select Units', '● Nine-Foot, Vaulted Ceilings In Select Units', '● Private Patio/Balcony', '● Private Storage Available In Select Units', '● Walk-In Closets', '● Wood-Style Flooring in Living Areas In Select Units', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 12:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Terms:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Allowed: Two pet maximum.', 'One Pet: $35 pet rent & $350 non-refundable fee.', 'Two Pets: $45 pet rent & $500 non-refundable fee.', 'No weight restriction.', 'Some breed restrictions apply.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'D38EB13CF16B43E']
